title: 80/764/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1980 establishing the schedule of tables and definitions relating to intermediate statistical surveys of areas under vines
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 July 1980  establishing the schedule of tables and definitions relating to intermediate statistical surveys of areas under vines  (80/764/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The form of the schedule of tables for the intermediate surveys on areas under vines and for the data referred to in Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 357/79 shall be as laid down in Annex I.
The definitions relating to the intermediate surveys shall be as laid down in Annex II.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
